blog.name: not-so-mundane-after-all-97

blog.description: Fangirl 4 life, Poland, 22, PROUD SWIFTIE SINCE 2008 💖STAR WARS, MARVEL, NARNIA, HARRY POTTER, and A LOT of TVSHOWS. Ahsoka Tano, Charlie Bradbury, Peggy Carter and Natasha Romanoff are my Queens. Barchie, Tyrondy, Clintasha, Steggy & Stydia for life. But give me a well written siblings/family dynamic and it Will have my heart from the first second. Oh, and I draw sometimes too.

summary: I don't know if anyone had already thought about this (at least I haven't seen any posts about it) but even though Tony is dead,...
body:
I don’t know if anyone had already thought about this (at least I haven’t seen any posts about it) but even though Tony is dead, we can still have Robert Downey Jr. in Far From Home - here’s how:

  • New vlogs made by Peter or Tony himself - it can be outtakes from Civil War and Homecoming, or even some completely new footage
  • Flashbacks - again, unused footage from CW or HC or new footage
  • A dream/vision/hallucination - that character Jake Gyllenhaal is playing (I forgot the name) apparently has some magic powers so it’s possible
  • A video/hologram message from Tony to Peter - I think this one is most likely to happen and it’s the one thing people want to see the most. Tony agreed to be the part of the Time Heist plan only because of Peter. And we know from his message to Pepper, that he was aware of the possibility of him dying beforehand - he recorded his message a day before they did this. There’s no way in hell he didn’t think “What if I get the kid back and I still end up dead?” So he records another message for Peter and then we have a scene of Peter watching it in FFH. They wouldn’t even have to have Robert on FFH set, this could’ve been easly done while shooting Endgame.

God, I hope I’m right with one of these at least. We’ll see in 2 months. But I really need some more Irondad and Spiderson, one last time 😭😭😭 And if you have other ideas, please share them here 😁

body:
Point of Interest

As fucking cool as Instant Kill was (I cheered so hard!), like what would it have done in his regular suit? The legs only exist in the Iron Spider suit. So what would that have done in the Spider Man suit? I have so many questions?

blog.name: i-love-tony-stark-3000
blog.title: MCU Lord and Saviour Tony Stark ⎊
blog.description: An Iron Man fan in mourning. Thank you, my darling. We'll all take care of Morgan for you. I love you 3000.

summary: I have mixed feelings over the prospect of Far From Home having flashbacks with Tony and Peter together, or perhaps a hologram...
body:
I have mixed feelings over the prospect of Far From Home having flashbacks with Tony and Peter together, or perhaps a hologram recording Tony did just in case. Like, of course, I want all of the Iron Dad content Marvel could ever feed me, but having the last words we ever hear him say be, “I love you 3000,” just seems too perfect of a bookend.

Overall, I want Tony’s absence to carry through FFH, but not overtake the focus of it. The director has stated that Peter will learn how to put the Man in Spider-Man this time around.

Fury’s not gonna be there to protect and mentor Peter like Tony was, he’s gonna push Peter to learn to stand on his own (like he really has a choice considering everyone keeps dying on him 😢).

If I had written the script, I would have had Tony leave a workshop in his Will for Peter to inherit so that he can start to build and upgrade his own suits and tech. Perhaps this workshop is funded privately by a trust fund or something. Happy would give him the key. Upon entering the workshop for the first time, Peter would receive a message from Tony there.

Tony would also be Peter’s AI, but we can’t have everything we want, can we???

I’m actually looking forward to the new trailer next week. It should give us a general idea of what to expect mood-wise and perhaps Iron Dad and Spider-Son wise as well.
